Class SentenceController

java.lang.Object
com.g63616e617a7a61.nonsensegenerator.controller.SentenceController
public class SentenceController extends Object
Controller class for managing sentence generation and transformation processes. Handles the conversion of input sentences to output sentences using templates, tense transformations, and vocabulary management. Automatically uploads results to cloud storage.
Author:
Enrico Giacomel

  • Constructor Details

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s)
      Constructs a controller with default settings.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s, boolean flag)
      Constructs a controller with vocabulary saving option.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text
      flag - If true, saves extracted words to vocabulary

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s, boolean flag, simplenlg.features.Tense t)
      Constructs a controller with vocabulary saving and specified tense.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text
      flag - If true, saves extracted words to vocabulary
      t - The tense to use for output sentence

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s, boolean flag, Template tmpl)
      Constructs a controller with vocabulary saving and specified template.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text
      flag - If true, saves extracted words to vocabulary
      tmpl - The template to use for sentence generation

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s, boolean flag, simplenlg.features.Tense t, Template tmpl)
      Constructs a controller with vocabulary saving, specified tense and template.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text
      flag - If true, saves extracted words to vocabulary
      t - The tense to use for output sentence
      tmpl - The template to use for sentence generation

    • SentenceController

      public SentenceController(String s, simplenlg.features.Tense t, Template tmpl)
      Constructs a controller with specified tense and template.
      Parameters:
      s - The input sentence text
      t - The tense to use for output sentence
      tmpl - The template to use for sentence generation

  • Method Details

    • getOutputSentence

      public String getOutputSentence()
      Gets the generated output sentence.
      Returns:
      The transformed output sentence as string

    • getSyntaxTree

      public List<SyntaxElement> getSyntaxTree()
      Gets the syntax tree of the input sentence.
      Returns:
      List of SyntaxElements representing the sentence structure

    • getToxicity

      public double getToxicity()
      Gets the toxicity score of the output sentence.
      Returns:
      Toxicity score between 0.0 (non-toxic) and 1.0 (highly toxic)

    • getTemplateList

      public static ArrayList<String> getTemplateList()
      Gets the list of available templates with placeholders replaced by descriptions.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of template strings with human-readable placeholders

    • rewriteTemplate

      public static String rewriteTemplate(String template)
      Converts a template with programmatic placeholders to a human-readable format.
      Parameters:
      template - Template string with programmatic placeholders (%na, %ad, etc.)
      Returns:
      Template string with human-readable placeholders ('name', 'adjective', etc.)

    • getRawTemplate

      public static String getRawTemplate(String input)
      Converts a template with descriptive placeholders back to raw format.
      Parameters:
      input - Template string with human-readable placeholders
      Returns:
      Template string with programmatic placeholders (%na, %ve, etc.)

    • getOutputSentenceObject

      public OutputSentence getOutputSentenceObject()
      Gets the OutputSentence object generated by this controller.
      Returns:
      The OutputSentence instance containing the transformed sentence and metadata
